title: ngGirls @ NG Rome 2025
announcement: We're excited to be part of NG Rome 2025 - and bring the ngGirls workshop to the local community! ngGirls @ NG Rome 2025 will take place on Thursday, June 19th, from 9:30-17:30 in Rome. For more details and application:

title: ngGirls @ NG Poland 2025
announcement: We're excited to be back at NG Poland 2025 - and bring the ngGirls workshop to the local community! ngGirls @ NG Poland 2025 will take place on Sunday, November 19th, from 10:00-17:00 in Warsaw. For more details and application:
